entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets or freezing rain and then changing to rain this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches developing this morning and dissipating this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:54 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 07:54 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
